name: DailyDoseofWisdom
0:
”Alexa ask daily wisdom a quote”
”Alexa ask daily wisdom to tell me something nice”
”Alexa ask daily wisdom to tell me a quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily wisdom
des:
Learn some wisdom and get your mind refreshed with great quotes from great people.
just say "alexa ask daily wisdom a quote" or
"alexa ask daily wisdom to tell me something nice"
Alexa will read some great words of wisdom from great people that may give you a great morning or a wonderful evening.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
